name: NFCReaderError.Code
desc: Reader session and tag error codes.

items.name: case readerSessionInvalidationErrorFirstNDEFTagRead
items.desc: The first NDEF tag read by this session is invalid.

items.name: case readerSessionInvalidationErrorSessionTerminatedUnexpectedly
items.desc: The reader session terminated unexpectedly.

items.name: case readerSessionInvalidationErrorSessionTimeout
items.desc: The reader session timed out.

items.name: case readerSessionInvalidationErrorSystemIsBusy
items.desc: The reader session failed because the system is busy.

items.name: case readerSessionInvalidationErrorUserCanceled
items.desc: The user canceled the reader session.

items.name: case ndefReaderSessionErrorTagNotWritable
items.desc: The NDEF tag isn’t writable.

items.name: case ndefReaderSessionErrorTagSizeTooSmall
items.desc: The NDEF tag memory size is too small to store the data.

items.name: case ndefReaderSessionErrorTagUpdateFailure
items.desc: The reader session failed to update the NDEF tag.

items.name: case ndefReaderSessionErrorZeroLengthMessage
items.desc: The NDEF tag doesn’t contain an NDEF message.

items.name: case readerTransceiveErrorRetryExceeded
items.desc: Too many retries have occurred.

items.name: case readerTransceiveErrorTagConnectionLost
items.desc: The reader lost the connection to the tag.

items.name: case readerTransceiveErrorTagNotConnected
items.desc: The tag isn’t in the connected state.

items.name: case readerTransceiveErrorTagResponseError
items.desc: The tag has responded with an error.

items.name: case readerTransceiveErrorSessionInvalidated
items.desc: The reader session is invalid.

items.name: case readerTransceiveErrorPacketTooLong
items.desc: The packet length exceeds the limit supported by the tag.

items.name: case tagCommandConfigurationErrorInvalidParameters
items.desc: The tag has been configured with invalid parameters.

items.name: case readerErrorUnsupportedFeature
items.desc: The reader session does not support this feature.

items.name: case readerErrorInvalidParameter
items.desc: An input parameter is invalid.

items.name: case readerErrorInvalidParameterLength
items.desc: The length of an input parameter is invalid.

items.name: case readerErrorParameterOutOfBound
items.desc: A parameter value is outside of the acceptable boundary.

items.name: case readerErrorRadioDisabled
items.desc: The NFC wireless radio on the device is disabled.

items.name: case readerErrorSecurityViolation
items.desc: A security violation associated with the reader session has occurred.
